entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except temperature steady near minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except temperature steady near minus 11 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
